title: Tesla hits $1 trillion market cap as stock rallies after Trump win
content: Shares of Tesla climbed in afternoon trading Friday, pushing the electric vehicle maker's market cap past $1 trillion.
summary: Shares of Tesla climbed in afternoon trading Friday, pushing the electric vehicle maker's market cap past $1 trillion.

title: ‘Two-stocks’ are better than one? Repacking ‘pair trades'

title: Painting the town pink and green: 'Wicked' takes over retail ahead of theatrical debut
content: Universal's "Wicked" is drumming up buzz ahead of its Nov. 22 release with hundreds of merchandise offerings from dozens of retail partners.
summary: Universal's "Wicked" is drumming up buzz ahead of its Nov. 22 release with hundreds of merchandise offerings from dozens of retail partners.

title: Top German business leader recalls his days working with Trump: 'His administration was extremely receptive'
content: It is uncertain what Donald Trump's second presidency will look like, but his first administration was highly responsive to business issues, Joe Kaeser said.
summary: It is uncertain what Donald Trump's second presidency will look like, but his first administration was highly responsive to business issues, Joe Kaeser said.

title: How Elon Musk stands to cash in on Trump's presidential victory
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk poured at least $130 million into a pro-Trump campaign effort after an assassination attempt on the former president in July.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk poured at least $130 million into a pro-Trump campaign effort after an assassination attempt on the former president in July.

title: American interest in moving abroad skyrockets after Trump's win — here's how many would actually leave
content: Google Trends showed searches related to "leaving the country" and "how to move to …" spiked following the news that Donald Trump is returning to the White House.

title: China announces $1.4 trillion package over five years to tackle local governments' 'hidden' debt
content: Authorities in Beijing have ramped up stimulus announcements since late September in an effort to bolster its flagging economy.

title: ChatGPT rejected more than 250,000 image generations of presidential candidates prior to Election Day
content: OpenAI estimates that ChatGPT rejected more than 250,000 requests to generate images of the 2024 U.S. presidential candidates in the lead up to Election Day.
summary: OpenAI estimates that ChatGPT rejected more than 250,000 requests to generate images of the 2024 U.S. presidential candidates in the lead up to Election Day.

title: Europe cannot finance Ukraine war if Trump pulls U.S. out of the conflict, Hungary's Orban warns
content: Ukraine has historically depended on foreign humanitarian and military aid to resist Russia's two-year invasion, with the U.S. and the EU providing the lion's share of this assistance.
summary: Ukraine has historically depended on foreign humanitarian and military aid to resist Russia's two-year invasion, with the U.S. and the EU providing the lion's share of this assistance.

title: How Black business leaders are thinking about a coming Trump administration
content: Black business leaders are weighing why Vice President Kamala Harris lost the presidential race, and how to approach President-elect Donald Trump.

title: China's stimulus plans are choking the profitability of its megabanks, analysts say
content: The country's banking industry has grappled with weakening profitability under the weight of lower mortgage rates and ailing credit demand.

title: Sony raises guidance on gaming strength, quarterly operating profit beats estimates
content: Sony raised sales guidance for the full year and posted operating profit that smashed analyst expectations after a strong quarter for its gaming business.

title: 'It's gross, it's unprofessional': Some LinkedIn users are being put off the platform by unsolicited flirtatious DMs

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: How will the next Trump administration impact India?
content: India is likely to have both winners and losers if President-elect Donald Trump chooses to enact trade tariffs, cut corporation tax, immigration and subsidies.

title: Top trader Vitol eyeing metals market as global oil demand set to peak in 10 years, CEO signals

title: Powell says he would not resign as Fed chief if Trump asked for his resignation

title: What Trump’s historic election victory means for the global economy
content: The former president's litany of pledges include steep tariffs, tax cuts, deregulation and a push to withdraw from key global agreements.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Powell emphasizes that elections won't sway Fed's policy

title: Trump likely to uphold CHIPS Act despite his campaign rhetoric, policy experts say
